### internet #############################
sudo su
cd /etc/network
ifconfig 
dmesg | grep enp5s0

gedit interfaces
###
auto eth0
iface eth0 inet dhcp


# guiou - sbc
#auto lo
#iface lo inet loopback 
# guiou - sbc


#auto eth1
#iface eth1 inet static
#address 200.133.215.18
#netmask 255.255.255.0
#gateway 200.133.215.3

#dns-nameserver 200.133.215.11
#dns-nameserver 200.133.215.12
####

gedit /etc/resolv.conf
###
nameserver 200.133.215.11
nameserver 200.133.215.12
###

# guiou - sbc
cat resolv.conf 
# Dynamic resolv.conf(5) file for glibc resolver(3) generated by resolvconf(8)
#     DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
nameserver 127.0.1.1
search ufabc.int.br ufabc.edu.br
# guiou - sbc



/etc/init.d/networking  restart
ifconfig 

# guiou - sbc
enp6s0f0  Link encap:Ethernet  Endereço de HW 0c:c4:7a:15:7e:e4  
          inet end.: 177.104.60.9
# guiou - sbc


/etc/init.d/network-manager  restart
ifconfig 
more interfaces
init 6

reboot

## ssh #############################
sudo apt-get install openssh-server
sudo service ssh status
sudo apt-get install emacs25
sudo emacs -nw /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sudo systemctl enable ssh
sudo emacs -nw /etc/ssh/sshd_config
###
Port 22
PermitRootLogin yes
###

sudo systemctl enable ssh

cd /var/www/
sudo mkdir /mnt/antigo
sudo mount /dev/sda9 /mnt/antigo/
sudo cp -rf /mnt/antigo/var/www/html/ .

sudo apt-get install wget


## ipython anaconda #############################
sudo apt-get install ipython
cd ~/Downloads/
wget http://repo.continuum.io/archive/Anaconda2-4.0.0-Linux-x86_64.sh
bash Anaconda2-4.0.0-Linux-x86_64.sh 
cd /usr/local

sudo apt-get install python-numpy python-scipy python-matplotlib ipython ipython-notebook python-pandas python-sympy python-nose
sudo apt-get install texlive texlive-latex-extra texlive-lang-portuguese
sudo apt-get install texlive-math-extra
latex

sudo apt-get install texlive-math-extra

sudo apt-get install python-PIL
sudo apt-get install PIL
sudo apt-get build-dep python-imaging
pip install http://effbot.org/downloads/Imaging-1.1.7.tar.gz 
sudo apt-get install libzbar-dev


ipython test.py _barcode.png



## dropbox #############################
wget -O - "https://www.dropbox.com/download?plat=lnx.x86_64" | tar xzf -
cd ~/.dropbox-dist/
dropbox status
dropbox start

## nvidia e cuda #############################

sudo apt-get autoremove
sudo apt-get autoclean


sudo apt-get purge nvidia*  
sudo reboot 

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:graphics-drivers/ppa
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install nvidia-358
sudo reboot 

emacs -nw ~/.bashrc
source .bashrc
$PATH
sudo apt-get install gcc-4.8 g++-4.8
sudo ln -s /usr/bin/gcc-4.8 /usr/local/cuda/bin/gcc
sudo ln -s /usr/bin/g++-4.8 /usr/local/cuda/bin/g++
cd /usr/local/cuda/samples/3_Imaging/convolutionSeparable/
sudo make
./convolutionSeparable 


## distmap #############################
mkdir ~/cuda
mkdir ~/cuda/distmap
cd ~/cuda/distmap
nvcc *.cu
mv a.out compare2
nice -20 ./runAll_linux >> reportTitanX.csv

## ftp #############################
sudo apt-get install vsftpd
sudo emacs -nw /etc/vsftpd.conf 
sudo service vsftpd restart
sudo emacs -nw /etc/shells 
sudo service vsftpd restart

sudo mkdir /srv/ftp/upload
sudo mkdir /srv/ftp/upload/MCTest4

sudo chown ftp:ftp -R /srv/ftp/
sudo chmod a-w /srv/ftp/
sudo chmod 777 /srv/ftp/upload/MCTest4/

—
sudo diff /etc/vsftpd.conf /mnt/antigo/etc/vsftpd.conf

listen=NO
listen_ipv6=YES
anonymous_enable=YES
local_enable=YES
write_enable=YES
anon_upload_enable=YES
anon_mkdir_write_enable=YES
ssl_enable=NO


# MCTest #############################
sudo mount /dev/sda8 /mnt/antigo/
cp -rf /mnt/antigo/usr/local/MCTestCircles/ .
mv MCTestCircles/ MCTest
cd MCTest/
mv MCTestCircles.py MCTest.py
emacs -nw MCTest.py 
sudo apt-get install libopencv-dev python-opencv
cat /mnt/antigo/etc/crontab
cat /etc/crontab 
emacs -nw /etc/crontab 
ll /srv/ftp/upload/MCTest5/
which ipython
apt-get install pip
apt-get install brew
apt-get install conda
apt-get install anaconda

pip install conda
pip install scikit-image
apt-get install libzbar-dev
apt-get install libzbar0
apt-get install libzbar-dev
apt-get install zbar-tools
apt-get install python2.7
apt-get install python-imaging
apt-get install python-zbar

sudo apt-get build-dep python-imaging
pip install http://effbot.org/downloads/Imaging-1.1.7.tar.gz
ipython test.py _barcode.png


conda install -c menpo opencv # version 2.4
conda install PIL
pip install PyPDF2

apt-get install libzbar-dev
pip install zbar
sudo apt-get install python3-matplotlib
sudo apt-get install python-matplotlib

——


Máquina do Guiou

sudo ssh fzampirolli@177.104.60.9


--
Máquina l104 - servidor de desenvolvimento corretor de provas

enp0s25:
inet 		172.17.162.122
netmask 	255.255.255.192
broadcast 	172.17.162.127
ether		a4:ba:db:04:97:e9

PT.01.083  --> PT.01.077
Dell 780
a4:ba:bd:04:97:e9
IPv4: 177.104.60.16
IPV6: 2801:a4:fabc:1035::16
ubuntu
21/tcp open ftp
22/tcp open ssh
80/tcp open http

--

Os computadores pegarão IP por DHCP.
Foram liberadas as aplicações ssh, ftp, http. As liberações valem até
26/10/2018 e deixarão de funcionar automaticamente. Esta liberação poderá ser
renovada através de abertura de chamado.
A conexão no ponto está permitida apenas para os Macs fornecidos conforme a
planilha enviada, e o ponto será bloqueado automaticamente caso seja conectado
outro equipamento neste.
Aguardamos as demais informações para darmos prosseguimento no chamado.


# 177.104.60.16 fz default; bios senha mctest
